com.cloudia.cloudia_android

Class SensorActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.cloudia.cloudia_android.BaseActivity
        • com.cloudia.cloudia_android.SensorActivity

  • public class SensorActivity
extends BaseActivity
    This is the activity when a station is selected. It shows the list of sensors for that station.
